subject: Writing
title: Greta Gerwig: From Actor to Auteur
description: Learn Greta Gerwig: From Actor to Auteur in one minute.

hook.text: Gerwig ad-libbed so brilliantly in indie films that directors told her to write her own. She did. Then she directed.

buildup.text: Gerwig co-wrote Frances Ha and Mistress America before writing and directing Lady Bird solo.

discovery.text: Lady Bird's script captured the specificity of a Sacramento teenager so precisely that audiences worldwide felt seen.

twist.text: She was told personal, female-centered stories were too small for wide release. Lady Bird grossed $79 million.

climax.text: With Little Women and Barbie, Gerwig became one of the highest-grossing female directors in history â€” through writing.

punchline.text: She proved personal stories aren't small. They're universal.
